name: handmade ICY ORANGE BLOSSOMS Carnelian Earring Dangles
description:
If ever I was wandering in a forest that whirled with freshly fallen snow, I would hope to find a tree of orange blossoms frozen on icy branches, magical enough to turn into scrumptious treats to eat.

A tiny 6mm round faceted pale icy orange carnelian bead nestles underneath an aluminum scalloped flower bead cap. A 5mm aquamarine faceted rondelle rests up top. Attached to hand formed and hammered 18 gauge sterling silver ear wires. Plastic earnuts supplied with ear wires. Just screw on and off.


*ear wires measure 1"
*total length: 1 1/2"


**Don't you just hate that when one of your earrings goes astray! Not any more! An antique button keeps earrings together. You get to keep! Your pair will look adorable displayed neatly together in a cute dish on your counter, dresser or nightstand.

options.name: handmade ICY ORANGE BLOSSOMS Carnelian Earring Dangles

name: The World's Fair
description:
***Oh how I love going to the fair! Don't you, too!?***


A sweet teal colored verdigris patina vintage brass World's Fair pendant hangs below a 17mm vintage cherry brand pale yellow lace spun glass bead. Several 4.5mm button pearls dangle throughout on brass chain hand wrapped with sterling silver head pins. A large brass lobster clasp secures this wonderful necklace closed.

Total length: 24" *adjustable* *shortens in length*

name: cherry bombs dangle earrings
description:
cherry bombs dangle earrings
zoom
cherry bombs dangle earrings cherry bombs dangle earrings cherry bombs dangle earrings cherry bombs dangle earrings cherry bombs dangle earrings
A very retro look exploding with outstanding color!

Faceted cherry quartz briolettes hang snugly below vintage aluminum pointed bead caps. Tiny citrine rondelles and faceted aquamarine rondelle beads sit upon top. Attached to hand formed and hammered 18 gauge sterling silver ear wires. Plastic earnuts supplied with ear wires. Just screw on and off. Simply adorable and funky!

*ear wires measure 3/4"
*total length: 1 1/2"


**Don't you just hate that when one of your earrings goes astray! Not any more! An antique button keeps earrings together. You get to keep! Your pair will look adorable displayed neatly together in a cute dish on your counter, dresser or nightstand.

name: mystic twilight necklace
description:
A firey orange summer sun hides away from the long days end as the warm firefly filled sky turns to twilight.

From the bottom of a pewter colored oxidized cable chain, three gorgeous gemstones cascade over each other. A warm hued mystic carnelian faceted briolette, topped with a silver flower bead cap and two small faceted labadorite rondelle beads, compliments nicely against the grayish blue flashes that sparkle and twinkle all throughout two various sized faceted labadorite flat briolette beads. All beads are wire wrapped in sterling silver onto the chain. Sterling silver lobster clasp and labadorite dangle simply finish off this enchanting necklace. Simplistic yet alluring!


total length: approx. 23" * chain can adjust to be shorter*

name: oh deer! sterling silver ring
description:
This awesomely cute little deer ring is ready to prance onto your finger!

A 12mm vintage lucite deer cabochon is set by me into a hand crafted sterling silver scalloped bezel which has been soldered onto a hand formed 4mm fern & fauna patterned band, that I antiqued for that sweet vintage look. 925 hallmark stamped on the inside of band.
I will make this for you upon request. After payment has been made, turn around time for done product is one business week. Therefore, your product will arrive to you in a timely matter. Please note what size you would like by informing me in the contact space provided in my shop when purchasing. If no size is noted, I will make your ring in a size 7.

Due to the handmade charm, no two will be alike, but always adorable!

Quantities of my vintage deer cabochons are limited, so if you want one,you better get one quick!!
